title: As a club, I want to see my outstanding Signing Bonus payments owed to players
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- On the MNC dashboard, add a new tab called "Payment Tracker"
- The tab hosts a new widget named "Payment Tracker"
- The tab and subnav option should be placed in alphabetical order
- The browser tab should say "Payment Tracker" when this tab is active

Population:
- All individual signing bonus payments that are coming up in the future. This equates to each row in an Approved minor contract's SB clause (with or without Visa Contingency)
- Logged in Club only sees items where they are the Org. Boc sees an Org toggle in the header that defaults to first club on list
- There is a totals row in the footer that totals all values in the "Amount" column based on the currently filtered list

Columns:
**Player** - Roster name, links to profile
**Payment Due** - Date that the payment is to be made according to the contract. If "within days of approval" is chosen, calculate the date from the "Approved" date. 
**Amount** - Auto populate commas.  Right align header and data.
**Status** - Set to 'Earned, not paid'
**Type** - Set to SGN
**Club** - Minor Lg club from the Contract's Add A
**Not Eligible** - requirements defined in #142354867
**Contract** - Contract type (eg. First yr Domestic), links to contract
**Paid** - requirements defined in #142354593
**Paid by** - Org contract is with

Sort Order:
Sort on player name

Global features:
Widget should have sort, type to filter, maximize and export capabilities

title: As a club,  I want to see CSP invoice payments owed to the players on the payment tracker
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- On the payment tracker show all CSP invoice payments owed to players. 
- If the payment has been made and date paid is available, status is "paid". Else, status is Earned not Paid.
- Type is "CSP-INV"
- All other columns are populated as normal
- No fields are editable for these rows for any user type
- Add 'CSP Invoice' option to the Type filter
- Any past data must match ebis 1

title: As a club, I want to mark an IBP as paid
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- The Paid column is editable to club and BOC on any IBP rows that have a Payment Due date.
- Once a paid date is added, set the status of the IBP payment to "Paid"

title: As a club, I want to see all Potential IBP payments owed to players
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- If a player has a currently 'Approved' MNC with an incentive bonus plan, show 3 rows in the tracker for each player

Type / Amount
IB-AA / 1000
IB-AAA / 1500
IB-ML / 5000

- Set status to "Potential". 
- "Paid" column should not be editable while status of these rows is still Potential
- All other columns should be populated as normal. Payment Due date is blank for potentials.
- Add "Potential" as a value to the Status filter
- Add all three IBP types to the Type filter
- All potential bonuses or rows without a payment date should be sorted above rows that have payment dates based on player name

title: As a club, I want to see my outstanding Dual Sport Bonus Payments owed to players
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- Similar to amounts entered in the SB clause in story #142353043, any amounts from an Approved MNC's Dual Sport Bonus clause (without or without Visa contingency) should also appear on the Payment tracker
- Type should be set to DUL. 
- All other requirements in stories #142353043, #142354095, #142354593 and #142354867 remain the same as Signing Bonus clause
- Add an additional filter behind the filter icon for Type. It should be a multi-select. By default, the widget should not be filtered on this criteria

title: As a club, I want to mark a Signing bonus as paid
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- Club should have an edit capabilities on the widget
- Only the Date paid field is editable and is a date picker field
- It is blank by default
- Club can save changes
- BOC can edit on any club's behalf
- On Saving a payment date, the status updates to "Paid"

title: As a club, I want to know when a player has earned an incentive bonus payment for being on the AAA or higher, or ML
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- Add additional logic to the Incentive Bonus batch to calculate if player has earned IB-AAA or IB-ML
- Using the same logic in #142358175, player can earn IB-AAA if they have service on AAA or higher level of play for 90 days. DL days can be counted toward the 90 if player has at least 60 regular service days
- Using the same logic in #142358175, player can earn IB-ML if they have service at the Major Leagues for 90 days. DL days can be counted toward the 90 if player has at least 60 regular ML service days
- Update Payment Due and Status on the Payment tracker if player has earned the bonus

Note: Earning a AAA or ML bonus does not disqualify the player from earning the AA bonus. Likewise, earning ML bonus does not disqualify player from earning AAA bonus

**New AC based on ebis 1 investigation**
- If an IBP is potential, and the player is traded, the Responsible Org for the IBP should be the new club of the player.
- If the IBP is Earned, or Paid, the Org should be locked to the Org under which he earned it with
- Any service with his period ORG should still count toward the IBP

title: As a club, I want to know when a player has earned an incentive bonus payment for being on the AA or higher
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**

General Batch AC
- This is calculated as a Nightly batch called "Incentive Bonus batch"
- It can be run in Report and Update mode on demand via the Batches interface
- It can also be run on an individual player ID
- Results are returned with each player that the batch as marked as having earned the bonus (can be negotiated)
- All other global batch requirements are consistent with other batches

Batch Activity
- Find all players who have a potential IBP, or 'earned but not paid' IBP (date paid should not be entered)
- For each player, verify if player has 60 or more days of service with a MJ or MN roster status of "Active" in the current season on an LOP that is AA or higher. Do not include past seasons.
- If yes, then verify if player has 90 or more days of service at AA or higher in the current season.
- If yes, then set the Payment due date of that player's IB-AA to the date that player will reach 90 days. This should show on Payment tracker
- If no, then verify if player has any DL days that will get him to 90 days. If Player is placed on the Disabled List after he has been credited with sixty or more days of service in any particular season, the Disabled List time shall be counted to his credit to 90 days. If this is met, then update the Payment due the tracker
- If the IB-AA payment due date is set, then update the status of that payment to "Earned, Not Paid"

**New AC based on ebis 1 investigation**
- If an IBP is potential, and the player is traded, the Responsible Org for the IBP should be the new club of the player.
- If the IBP is Earned, or Paid, the Org should be locked to the Org under which he earned it with
- Any service with his previous ORG should still count toward the IBP

title: As a club, I want to see all potential CSP payments that I owe players on the payment tracker
custom_steps:

http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

- Type is "CSP-Tuition Allowance" or "CSP-Living Allowance"
- Payment Due is set to "Pay per period"
- Date paid is set to "Exp [Date]"
- All other columns are populated as normal
- No fields are editable for these rows for any user type
- Add 'CSP Balance' option to the Type filter that will show all pending Tuition and Living allowance payments
- Any past data must match ebis 1

title: As a club, I want to see all potential Contingency bonus payments owed to players
custom_expected:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**AC**
- If a player has a currently 'Approved' MNC with a contingency bonus plan, show a row in the tracker for each level of play listed in the Contingency bonus clause of each contract
- Show Type as "Contingency" for each row
- Populate the Club column as shown in contract
- Populate the Amount column as shown in contract
- Set status to "Potential". 
- "Paid" column should not be editable while status of these rows is still Potential
- All other columns should be populated as normal. Payment Due date is blank for potentials.
- Add this type to the Type filter

title: As a Club, I want to see a player's past and future bonuses on his profile
custom_expected:
**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=contracts

**AC**
- On the pro player profile, add a new widget under the contracts tab below contract history. 

Population
- The "Minor League Bonus Payment Widget" shows all bonuses pertaining to that player that would also show in the Payment tracker widget. They can be in any status
- The widget is default sorted with rows missing a payment date on top followed by rows with payment date in chronological order
- Secondary sort is on the bonus type column
- Widget is not editable

The widget has the following columns populated
- Bonus Type
- Amount
- Status
- Date Due
- Responsible
- Date Paid
- Paid By

title: As a club, I want to see my outstanding Mexican Agreement payments owed to players
custom_expected:
**AC**
- If a contract has a Mexican Assignment agreement, then on contract approval, the amount in the "Portion of fee paid to player" should appear in the tracker
- Type should be set to "Mex" and status is "Earned not Paid"
- Date Due is set to Contract Signing Date
- All other requirements work similar to Signing bonuses workflow

title: As a tester, I want to access the API responses
custom_expected:
**AC**
- Testers have a basic UI to select the API, and to supply input parameters
- They should also see the returned API response in a readable JSON format (with indents)
- The UI will have a basic Expand and collapse feature
- The UI should allow the tester to login with an API credential

title: As a club, I want my CSP payments to offset any potential IBP bonus payments
custom_expected:
The offset is 2-ways - earning CSP money will lower what you can potentially earn with an IBP, and vice versa.  The tracker will reflect these changes.  

**AC**
 - If CSP invoices are created and saved, the system should look for potential IBP's for that player and reduce the amount of the IBP for an equivalent amount. 
- If the IBP amount reaches zero (0) , then the IBP should be marked as "Offset" by the system for the amount $0. 
- Always first offset the 2A IBP, then the 3A and finally the ML IBP.
- 'Offset' is a new status and should be added to applicable widget filters
- Any historical offset information from EBIS 1 should be available in Ebis 2

title: As a club, I want to see the bonus tracker if I have MNC permissions
custom_expected:
**AC**
- If a club has MNC Admin permissions, they can view and edit the tracker. They can also view the bonus widget on the player profile
- If a club has MNC Read only permissions, they can view the tracker and profile widget but not make any edits

title: As a club, I want to see Name, Birth date and Roster status for any given player ID
custom_expected:
**AC**
- Tester can submit a date range parameter as defined in #144462243 to get back a JSON response
- The JSON Response has the following fields populated for each Player ID included in the response:
First Name
Last Name
Roster Name
Birthdate (formatted same as UI mm/dd/yyyy)
Current MJ Roster Status
Current MN Roster Status
- Data in the feed must match what is on the UI for that player's profile
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information
- Amateur/Employee profile info should not get returned. Response should return as Player ID invalid
- If value is not available, do not show field label

title: As a club, I want to see player header info returned for a player ID
custom_expected:
**Links**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Pro+Player+Profile

**AC**
- Remaining Fields listed on the linked wiki under player profile header section should be added to the API
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the player profile header
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

title: As a club, I want to see Bio info returned for a player ID
custom_expected:
**Links**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Feed+Requirements%3A+Pro+Player+Profile

**AC**
- Remaining Fields listed on the linked wiki under Bio info section should be added to the API
- Data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the player profile header
- The user who made the last update to the profile should not appear in the feed even though it's visible on the UI
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information

Questions:
- Arrange under sub headers?

title: As a club, I want IBP payments  to offset my CSP payments
custom_expected:
The offset is 2-ways - earning CSP money will lower what you can potentially earn with an IBP, and vice versa.  The tracker will reflect these changes.  

**AC**
- If an IBP status is updated to "earned not paid" by the IBP batch, the  batch should also decrease the money left in a CSP up to where it can be marked as "Completed".  
- This should behave similarly to the CSP completing via invoices. (See CSP)  
- Any historical offsets from EBis 1 should be available in ebis 2

title: As a club, I want any unearned bonuses to get expired on terminating or expiring a player's contract
custom_expected:
**AC**
- If a player with a potential IBP is released or made a Free Agent and is no longer tied to any Org, then when the nightly IBP batch runs, check for these players and mark their IBP status to "Cancelled"
- Any earned and or paid IBP's should be left as is.
- Similarly if any players with potential CON bonuses are released or declared FA, then the CON bonus batch should set the status of the potential bonus to "Cancelled"
- "Cancelled" is a new status and should be added to available list of filters
- Any historical data from EBis 1 should be displayed correctly
- Expired IBP and Con Bonuses are locked to the ORG they expired with

title: As a club, I want to see any contingency payments already paid
custom_expected:
**Wireframe**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=bonus_payment_tracker

**Ac**
- Show all contingency Bonuses paid in the past with the "Paid" column populated with the date paid and the Payment Due column, using data from Ebis 1

title: As a club, I want player IDs that have been changed or been created for a given date range
custom_expected:
**AC**
- Tester can input a date range  
- Response returns with player IDs where for that player, a field in the player profile (excluding service fields) has been changed within the date range
- If a profile has become a pro player profile within the date range, then include in the list
- Response should be returned under 2 seconds
- Only logged in users with an API role can access this information
- Only return player IDs for Pro player profiles
- If date range is invalid, return an error response code

Questions
- Are change stamps at the field level? If not, how do we tell which players change?


Example syntax: fromDate=5/15/2017&toDate=5/16/2017
